headline.main: Canada PM Condemns Pepper Spraying of Syrian Refugees

docs.snippet: Volkswagen should be forced to replace old, diesel-belching school buses as penance for its emissions cover-up....
docs.lead_paragraph: Volkswagen should be forced to replace old, diesel-belching school buses as penance for its emissions cover-up.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Joshua M Sharfstein and Frances Phillips suggests part of potential $20 billion in fines Volkswagen faces, due to lawsuit filed by Environmental Protection Agency over company's cheating on diesel emissions tests, should be used to replace nation's aging fleet of school buses.

byline.original: By JOSHUA M. SHARFSTEIN and FRANCES PHILLIPS

docs.snippet: Laura Gideon and her family endured the sickening stench from an out-of-control natural gas leak for about a month before they could no longer tolerate the nausea, headaches and nosebleeds....
docs.lead_paragraph: Laura Gideon and her family endured the sickening stench from an out-of-control natural gas leak for about a month before they could no longer tolerate the nausea, headaches and nosebleeds.

headline.main: Invisible Disaster Drives People From Upscale LA Community
headline.print_headline: Invisible Disaster Drives People From Upscale LA Community

docs.snippet: As the sun sets over Iraq's southern city of Basra, Ahmed Hilal rushes to lock his door. At night, every knock sends his heart beating faster. In the morning, the father of three or someone he trusts walks his children to school, barely five minut...
docs.lead_paragraph: As the sun sets over Iraq's southern city of Basra, Ahmed Hilal rushes to lock his door. At night, every knock sends his heart beating faster. In the morning, the father of three or someone he trusts walks his children to school, barely five minutes away.

headline.main: As Iraq Fights Islamic State, Violence Rises in Shiite South
headline.print_headline: As Iraq Fights Islamic State, Violence Rises in Shiite South
